trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that represents the number of fields.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Integer" /> que representa o número de campos.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Object" /> that contains the fields.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Object" /> que contém os campos.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle a <see langword="WillChangeField" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá manipular um evento de <see langword="WillChangeField" /> .

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Funções e os objetos no namespace <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> são fornecidos para uso pelas ferramentas para atualização do Visual Basic 6.0 para o [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, essas funções e objetos duplicam a funcionalidade que é possível encontrar em outros namespaces no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: Eles só são necessários quando o modelo de código do Visual Basic 6.0 é muito diferente da implementação de [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
